Text:
Shame on desitorrents, again. They are sharing this movie with members only. Moreover, they have not mentioned anything about the beautiful lyrics of the song. It means that they do not have the intellectual and spiritual depth to understand the beautiful lyrics in the movie. Intellectual paupers. Anyway, I have uploaded the movie split as two CD files. Each of them is a 699 MB AVI file. The specs are:

Video: Xvid 640x480 29.97fps 1259kbps
Audio: MPEG Audio Layer 3 48000Hz stereo 128kbps

No subtitles have been included as this is a movie for people who understand Urdu and specifically, Urdu Poetry.
